title: 2015 Udhampur terrorist attack
text:
On 5 August 2015 two Lashkar e Tayyaba terrorist attacked a BSF convoy in <a href="Udhampur">Udhampur</a>. One terrorist, <a href="Mohammad%20Naved">Mohammed Naved</a> was caught alive in the attack while the other one was killed. Both of them were Pakistani citizens. This terrorist was caught with the help of villagers.
The mastermind of the attack, <a href="Lashkar-e-Taiba">let</a> commander 
was killed on 29 October 2015 in the Kulgam area of Kashmir, in a joint operation by Jammu and Kashmir Police and the Indian Army. According to let chief Qasims real name was abdul rehman and he was a resident of multan pakistan.
<a href="Sabzar%20Bhat">Sabzar Bhat</a> was indicted for transporting the two attackers; he would in 2016 become a commander of the hizbul mujahidin
<a href="Hizbul%20Mujahideen">a</a>.
